title: Quarkus 2.14.0.Final released - Jandex 3, new Redis commands, caching annotations for Infinispan
content: Today, we released Quarkus 2.14.0.Final with a lot of new features and small improvements all over the place: Upgrade to Jandex 3 Include quarkus-opentelemetry-exporter-otlp into quarkus-opentelemetry Additional Redis commands RESTEasy Reactive: multipart form improvements Support for caching annotations for Infinispan Improved Kotlin support for Hibernate Reactive with Panache Support embedding...
